projects.text: Design and development of new functionalities for the company's software platform focused on digitalising processes and organizations of the industrial sector.
Analyze and enhance the platform's UX/UI design by identifying areas for improvement, ensuring design consistency, and proposing solutions to optimize user experience and accessibility.
Hybrid mobile app development focused on smart boilers, including new functionalities and improving usability.
Websites development, business logic and leads management for a banking sector client, working hand in hand with design and marketing with focus on UX and conversion.
New design system development for a telecommunications business group, creating components and contributing to improve brand consistency and project scalability.
Collaborating with a freelance designer in branding, web and brand creation processes.
I took part in interior design, rehabilitation, restoration and heritage research projects.
